title: AIDA Single Pole Triple Paddle Rocker Decorator Light Switch, 15 Amp Self-grounding Electrical Light Switches, Residential Grade, UL Listed (1 Pack, Glossy White)

product_information.Best Sellers Rank: Best Sellers Rank:  #72,279 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement)    #239 in Electrical Light Switches       #239 in Electrical Light Switches

shipping_info: FREE Thursday, June 12 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
product_category: Tools & Home Improvement‚Ä∫Electrical‚Ä∫Switches & Dimmers‚Ä∫Wall Switches‚Ä∫Light Switches
feature_bullets: „ÄêThree combinated Single Pole Switch„ÄëAIDA triple paddle rocker Switch allows to control up to 3 fixtures from one location. Ideal for use in residential and most commercial where space in the electrical wall box is limited.
„ÄêSelf-Grounding„ÄëIt can be automatically connected to a well-grounded metal wall junction box.
„ÄêHigh Quality„ÄëDecorator rocker switch is made of impact-resistant polycarbonate thermoplastic and solid steel, which is beautiful and durable.
„ÄêEasy Installation„ÄëProvide both back wiring and side wiring. Shallow back body leaves more space for wires in the box.
„ÄêUniversal Application„ÄëWall switch suitable for residential use and most commercial areas that require only 15Amp switches.
„Äê100% Guarantee & Service„ÄëUL & CUL listed , Backed 30-days free return & free lifetime technical online support within 24 hours.

customers_say: Customers find the light switch works well and is very easy to install. They appreciate its compact size.AI Generated from the text of customer reviews

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Works well.  Small one plate size for three separate things. Convenient.

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsIF you need 3 switches to put in a single box, this is your answer..
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: If you add a ceiling fan to a single switch location....You probably need room for two more switches, a fan and a light...You can do that without needing to add two more boxes....This may also be your solution to a bathroom fan, night light, light situation...Worked well....would purchase again....

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2025

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsCompact and good looking
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Very nice but note very compact if replacing a OLD 3x if so you will need a BLANK cover to fill gap. But it was very easy to install and very sharp looking compared to the old cream color big light switch. Thank you üòä highly recommended.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2025

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsSturdy, well built, fits well
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: My old 3 gang switch had started to fall apart. This one feels much more sturdy and was a fairly easy to install replacement.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Cover is a lot smaller than the ones from the store so just keep that in mind.

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsInstalled and worked perfectly
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: I had this out of the box and replacing the defective switch I had in less than 10 min.
